general_info.summary: Airbus is a global leader in aeronautics, space and related services. It offers the most comprehensive range of passenger airliners and is a European leader providing tanker, combat, transport, and mission aircraft.

news.headline: Airbus unveils new zero-emission aircraft
news.content: Airbus has announced a new zero-emission aircraft concept that could enter service by 2035...

news.headline: Airbus secures 100-plane deal
news.content: Airbus has secured a deal for 100 new aircraft from Airline X, in a move that will bolster its order book...

news.headline: Airbus to expand into urban air mobility
news.content: Airbus is set to expand its operations into the urban air mobility sector, with plans to develop a line of electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft...

news.headline: Airbus partners with tech giants for AI advancements
news.content: In a groundbreaking collaboration, Airbus has partnered with leading tech firms to integrate artificial intelligence into its aircraft systems...

news.headline: Airbus achieves new safety milestone
news.content: Airbus has reached a new safety milestone with its A320 aircraft family, surpassing 10 million flight hours without an incident...

news.headline: Airbus launches satellite with unique capabilities
news.content: Airbus Defence and Space has successfully launched a new satellite that offers unprecedented observation and communication capabilities...
